mosinstall.author: Joomla! Project
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: This component manages the Search functionality.

param.name: show_google
param.label: Show Google Search
param.description: Shows the link to search for the text in google

param.name: show_section
param.label: Show Section
param.description: Display section information for the search result items

param.name: show_preview
param.label: Show Preview Text
param.description: Display preview text for the search result items

param.name: show_date
param.label: Show Date
param.description: Display date for the search result items

param.name: text_highlight
param.label: Highlight Text
param.description: Highlights the search term(s) in the preview text items
